      • setStatusPerPage

        public void setStatusPerPage(int statusPerPage)

      • removeSP

        public static java.util.List<twitter4j.Status> removeSP(java.util.List<twitter4j.Status> statuses)
        Attempts to remove sponsored ads from a Status List Currently checks for the following (Case insensitive):
        • #SPON
        • #SP
        Parameters:
        statuses - - The list of statuses to remove the sponsored ads from
        Returns:
        A new Status List with the sponsored ads removed
